types:type.name: access
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type access = {| username: String, password: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"username\":\"demouser\",\"password\":\"hallo!demo05\"}"}

types:type.name: role
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type role = {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"id\":1,\"name\":\"Administrator\"}"}
